body: Senator, if we as democrats say we are done with private insurance that has only hurt he American people in so many ways we are going to give something that works t=for their families full coverage that they can depend on. If we say that then there is an election. The American people get to decide. The ultimate choice, Senator, is an election. And this should be the party that stands for universal healthcare and says, we are not going to accept anything less. Right now in America so many people don't have the healthcare they need. That is a fact. 10s of millions of people including middle class people. Give them a chance--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: --through an election.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: This is not a republican talking point. Republicans are trying to kill Obamacare. Obamacare took care of 20 million people right off the bat. 100 million people with pre-existing conditions. And in fact, what we got is a public option that in fact, would allow anybody to buy in. No one has to keep their private insurance. They can buy into this plan. And they can buy into it with a thousand dollar deductible and never have to pay more than 8.5 percent of their income when they do it. And if they don't have any money they get in free. So, this idea is a bunch of malarkey that we're talking about here.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: The fact of the matter is--the fact of the matter is that there will be a deductible or a deductible in their paycheck. Bernie acknowledges it. Bernie acknowledges. 3 -- $30 trillion has to ultimately be paid. And I don't know what math you do in New York. I don't know what math you do in California, but I tell you that --

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --that's a lot of money, and there will be a deductible. The deductible will be out of your paycheck because that is what will be required.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: Yeah, let's talk about math. Let's talk about math. Let's talk about the fact that the pharmaceutical companies and the insurance companies last year alone profited $72 billion, and that is on the backs of American families, and under your plan status quo, you do nothing to hold the insurance companies to task for what they have been doing to American families. In American today, a diabetes patient, one in four cannot afford their insulin. In America today--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --for those people who have overdosed from an opioid there is a syringe that costs $4,000--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --that will save their life. It is immoral. It is untenable--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --and it must change with Medicare For All.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Real quick I have the only plan that limits the ability of insurance companies to charge unreasonable prices, flat out, number one. Number two we should put some of these insurance executives who totally opposed my plan in jail for this 9 billion opioids they sell out there. They are misrepresenting to the American people what need to be done. And lastly, here's the deal, the deal is let's figure out how this works. We eat immediately are able to cover everybody who wants to get off their insurance plan, they don't like no matter what one it is and by into a Medicare option. They can buy the goal plan; they are not going to have to pay anyway.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Thank you for that question. You know if you elect me president you are not electing me to follow, you are electing me to lead, and open borders is a right-wing talking point, and frankly, I am disappointed that some folks including some folks on this stage have taken the bait. The only way that we are going to guarantee that we don't have family separations in this country again is to repeal Section 1325 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: That is the law that this president, this administration is using to incarcerate migrant parents and then physically separate them from their children. My immigration plan would also make sure that we put undocumented immigrants who having committed a serious crime on a pathway to citizenship, that we do a 21st century Marshall plan with Honduras, El Salvador, and Guatemala so that we can get to the root of this challenge so people can find safety and opportunity at home instead of having to come to the United States.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: That is how we can be smarter, more effective, and more humane when it comes to immigration policy.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: Well again with all due respect after the last debate for example I went to a place in Florida called Homestead and there is a private detention facility being paid for by your taxpayer dollars, a private detention facility that currently houses 2700 children and by the way there were members of us Julian was there, members of Congress, they would not let us enter the place, members of the United States Congress.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: So I walked down the road, I climbed a ladder, and I looked over the fence, and I'm going to tell you what I saw. I saw children lined up single file based on gender being walked into barracks. The policies of this administration have been facilitated by laws on the books--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --that allow them to be incarcerated as though they have committed crimes.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: These children have not committed crimes--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --and should not be treated like criminals.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: With all due respect to my friend Michael Bennet (INAUDIBLE)

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Absolutely not, number one. Number two, everything landed on the president's desk but locust. I found that Julian (PH)--excuse me. The secretary, we sat together in many meetings. I never heard him talk about any of this when he was the secretary.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --The fact is--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: The fact is--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I don't know if you can hear. I can hear it, but anyway.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Okay.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: The fact is what the senator from New York talked about is seeking asylum. That woman, the women she spoke to are entitled to asylum. That is not crossing the border illegally. What we should do is flood the zone to make sure we have people to make those decisions quickly. With regard to seven--with regard to the secretary's point, I already proposed and passed

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: $750 million for Guatemala, El Salvador, and Honduras to be able to change the circumstance why people fled in the first place. In addition to that, we're in a circumstance where if in fact you say you can just cross the border, what do you say to all those people around the world who, in fact, want the same thing, to come to the United States and make their case, but they don't--that they--they have to wait in line? The fact of the matter is you should be able to--if you cross the border illegally, you should be able to be sent back. It's a crime. It's a crime. And it's not one that, in fact--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Yeah. First of all, Mr. Vice President, it looks like one of us has learned the lessons of the past and one of us hasn't. Let me begin by telling you

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Let me just start out by answering that question. My immigration plan would also fix the broken legal immigration system--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --I agree--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: --Because we do have a problem with that. Secondly, the only way that we're going to guarantee that these kinds of family separations don't happen in the future is that we need to repeal this law. There's still going to be consequences if somebody crosses the border. It's a civil action. Also, we have 654 miles of fencing. We have thousands of personnel at the border. We have planes. We have boats--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: --We have helicopters, we have the security cameras.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: What we need are politicians--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: --That actually have some guts on this issue.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I have guts enough to say his plan doesn't make sense. Here's the deal. The fact of the matter is that in fact, when people cross the border illegally, it is illegal to do it unless they're seeking asylum. People should have to get in line. That's the problem. And the only reason this particular part of the law is being abused is because of Donald Trump. We should defeat Donald Trump and end this practice.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: Our hearts break when we see those children at these detention facilities who've been separated from their parents, when we see human beings crowded into cages in abhorrent, inhumane conditions. This is about leadership and --

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: --understanding that we can and should have both secure borders as well as humane immigration policies. We will have to stop separating children from their parents, make it so that it's easier for people to seek asylum in this country, make sure that we are securing our borders, and making it so that people are able to use our legal immigration system by reforming those laws.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: I am the son of immigrants myself. My father immigrated here as a graduate student and generated over 65 U.S. patents for GE and IBM. I think that's a pretty good deal for the United States. That's the immigration story we need to be telling. We can't always be focusing on some of the--the--the distressed stories. And if you go to a factory here in Michigan, you will not find wall-to-wall immigrants, you will find wall-to-wall robots and machines. Immigrants are being scapegoated for issues they have nothing to do with in our economy.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Absolutely. First of all, I just want to say again tonight, we are playing into Republican hands--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --who have a very different view and they're trying to divide us against each other. I'm listening to the language of my colleagues. No, Mr. Vice President, we are not going to just let people cross the border. An unlawful crossing is an unlawful crossing if you do it in the civil courts or if you do it through the criminal courts. But the criminal courts is what is getting Donald Trump the ability to truly violate the human rights of people coming to our country who no one surrenders their human rights.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: And so doing it through the civil courts means that you won't need these awful detention facilities that I have been to, seen children sleeping on pavement, people being put in cages, nursing mothers, small children, this is not necessary. We have seen using the civil system piloted programs that have 100 percent compliance with the civil courts where people are evaluated. If they have no justifiable reason to be here, they are returned. If they are, like the people I met in Juarez, who were survivors of sexual assault who we wouldn't even let come and present for asylum. We are butchering our values--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --And making ourselves less safe.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I agree with the senator. The asylum process is a real process and this president is ruining it. It has nothing to do with that section of the law. That's what he's doing. Number one. Number two, we should in fact, and we have proposed and we tried to get it passed in our administration, I proposed significantly increasing the number of legal immigrants that are able to come. This country can tolerate a heck of a lot more people. And the reason we are the country we are is we been able to cherry pick from the best of every culture. Immigrants built this country. That's why we are so special. It took courage, it took resilience, it took absolute confidence for them to come and we should be encouraging--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --people. And by the way, anybody across that crosses the stage with a--with a PhD should get a green card for seven years. We should keep them here.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: Two points. One, it's all kind of a charade because there's 11 million people here and everyone in theory has broken the law, but they're part of our communities now. They're part of our economy. They are our neighbors. Why are we even discussing on one level whether it's a civil penalty or criminal penalty when it's in American reality? And what we need is comprehensive immigration reform once and for all to fix it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: Second, Vice President Biden, I didn't hear your response when the issue came up of all those deportations. You are vice president of the United States. I didn't hear whether you tried to stop them or not using your power, your influence in the White House. Did you think it was a good idea or did you think it was something that needed to be stopped?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: The president came along and he's the guy that came up with the idea, first time ever, of dealing with the Dreamers. He put that in the law. He--he talked about a comprehensive plan which he put on the--label for the Congress saying that we should find a pathway to citizenship for people. He said we should up the number of people that were able to bring into this country. Lastly, he also pointed out that we should go to the source of the problem and fix it where people were leaving in the first place. So he did--compare him to Donald Trump, I think is absolutely bizarre.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: I don't. I think it's important for us to fix our legal immigration system and look at the millions of undocumented immigrants in this country who have been suffering as they have been living in the shadows. And instead of putting a band aid on this problem--fix our legal immigration system to provide them with that pathway to legal residency or citizenship so that they are no longer treated as second class citizens in this country. We have got to look at the challenge that people all across this country are facing under crushing student debt. This is something that is impacting my generation in a huge way. And I believe that it is our generation that has the bold, creative solutions to be able to solve it. This is about promise for our future. And we've got to make those kind of investments.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: I agree with the Congresswoman, but I don't hear an answer from the Vice President I'm confused. I asked the Vice President point blank did he use his power to stop those deportations. He went right around the question. Mr. Vice President, you want to be President of the United States. You need to be able to answer the tough questions. I guarantee you if you're debating Donald Trump, he's not going to let you off the hook. So, did you say those deportations were a good idea or did you go to the President and say, this is a mistake--we shouldn't do it? Which one?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I was Vice President. I am not the President. I keep my recommendation in private. Unlike you I expect you would say what everyone said privately with him, but it's not what I do. What I do say to you is he moved to fundamentally change the system. That's what he did. That's what he did. And much more has to be done. Much more has to be done.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: I still don't hear an answer.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Well, couple things--first of all, Mr. Vice President, you can't have it both ways. You invoke President Obama more than anybody in this campaign. You can't do it when it's convenient.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: And then dodge it when it's not. And then the second thing, and this really irks me because I heard the Vice President say that--you got a PhD you can come right into this country. Well, that's playing into what the republicans want--to pit some immigrants against other immigrants.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Some are from shithole countries and some are from (INAUDIBLE) countries. We need to reform this whole immigration system and begin to be the country that says everyone has worth and dignity and this should be a country that honors everyone. Don't let the republicans divide this party against itself.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: The fact is--that's what I said about this country. We are a country of immigrants, all of us. All of us. Some here came against their will. Others came because they in fact thought they could fundamentally change their lives and they did. The (INAUDIBLE) that's what we're talking about. That's what made us great. And the fact of the matter is I think the President of the United States, Barack Obama, went out of his way to change the system and he got pushed back significantly.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Well I don't--I think he is wrong and I think we should work together. He has a similar plan. I think that we should change the way we look at prisons.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Right now we are in a situation where when someone is convicted of--of a drug crime they end up going to jail and to prison. They should be going to rehabilitation; they shouldn't be going to prison. When in prison, they should be learning to read and write and not just sit in there and learn how to be better criminals.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: And when they get out of prison they should be in a situation where they have access to everything they would have had be for including Pell grants for education, including making sure that they are able to have housing, public housing, including they have all of the opportunities that were available to them because we want them to become better citizens.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: That is the essence of what my plan in detail lays out. I'm happy to discuss it or in detail, if the Senator would want to. And so I--you know, I--I look--anyway. That's what I think my plan--I know what my plan does, and I think it's not dissimilar to what the senator said we should be working together on getting things done. (INAUDIBLE)

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Well, my responses that this is a crisis in our country because we have treated issues of race and poverty, mental health, and addiction with locking people up and not lifting them up. And Mr. Vice President--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --has said that since the 1970s every major crime bill--every crime bill, major and minor, has had his name on it. And sir, those are your words not--not mine. And this is one of those instances where the house was set on fire, and you claim responsibility for those laws and you can't just now come out with a plan to put out that fire. We have got to have far more bold action on criminal justice reform like having true--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --by having true marijuana justice which means that we legalize it--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --on a federal level--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --and reinvest the profits in communities that have been--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --disproportionately targeted by marijuana enforcement.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: The fact is that the bills that the president that excuse me the future president here that--that the senator is talking about our bills that were passed years ago and they were passed overwhelmingly.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Since 2007 I, for example, tried to get the crack powder cocaine totally disparity totally eliminated. In 2007 you became mayor. You had a Police Department that was--you went out, and you hired Rudy Giuliani's guy and engaged in stop and frisk, you had 75 percent of those stops reviewed as the legal. You found yourself in a situation with three times as many African Americans were caught in that chain and caught up. The Justice Department came after you for saying you were--you are engaging in behavior that was inappropriate and then in fact and nothing happened. The entire time you were mayor.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Well, first of all, I am grateful that he endorsed my presidency already, but I will tell you this it's no secret that I inherited a criminal--a Police Department with massive problems and decades-long challenges. But the head of the ACLU has already said, the head of the New Jersey ACLU, then I put forth national standard-setting accountability.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: At that time--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Mr. Vice President--Mr. Vice President, I didn't interrupt you, please show me that respect, sir.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: (INAUDIBLE)

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: We have a system right now that is broken and if you want to compare records, and frankly I'm shocked that you do I am happy to do that--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --because all of the problems that he is talking about that he created I actually live the bill that got passed into law that reverses the damage that your bills that you were frankly to correct you, Mr. Vice President, you were bragging calling it the Biden crime bill up to 2015.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Number one, the bill he talks about is a bill that in my--our administration we passed. We passed that bill that you added onto. That is the bill, in fact, you past. And the fact of the matter is secondly there was nothing done for the entire eight years he was mayor. There was nothing done to deal with the police department that was corrupt. Why did you announce in the first day a zero-tolerance policy of stop and frisk and hired Rudy Giuliani's guy in 2007 when I was trying to get rid of the crack cocaine (INAUDIBLE)?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Mr. Vice President, there is a saying in my community you are dipping into the Kool-Aid, and you don't even know the flavor.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: You need to come to the City of Newark and see the reforms that we have put into place. The New Jersey head of the ACLU has said that I embrace reforms not just in action but indeed. Sir, you are trying to shift the view from what you created.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: There are people right now in prison for life for drug offenses because you stood up and used that tough on crime phony rhetoric that got a lot of people elected but destroyed communities like mine. This isn't about the past, sir; this is about the present right now. I believe in redemption--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: I'm happy you have--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --(INAUDIBLE) but you offered no redemption to the people--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --In prison right now for life.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Yeah, well I agree with Senator Booker that--I agree with Senator Booker that a lot of what Vice President helped author in '94 was a mistake and he has flip-flopped on those things these things, and that's clear. But let me say we talk about criminal justice reform, there are a lot of things that we can talk about. Sentencing reform, cash bail reform, investing in public defenders, diversion programs. I'm proud that I'm the only candidate that has put forward a police reform plan because we have a police system that is broken--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: And we need to fix it. And whether it's the case of someone like Tamir Rice or Michael Brown or Eric Garner where the Trump Justice Department just decided not to pursue charges.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: We need to ensure we have a national use of force standard and that we end qualified immunity from police officers so that we can hold them accountable for using excessive force.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Well, then it's much more than that because what we see, this was a good example the other day of--of the Department of Justice not going after Officer Pantileo (SP) that--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: You know, Officer Pantileo used a chokehold that was prohibited by NYPD. He did that for seven seconds. 11 different times, Eric Garner said that he couldn't breathe. He knew what he was doing, that he was killing Eric Garner, and yet he has not been brought to justice. That police officer should be off the street.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: Well, let me tell you, I know the Garner family. They've gone through extraordinary pain. They are waiting for justice and they're going to get justice. There's finally going to be injustice, I have confidence in that, in the next 30 days in New York. You know why? Because for the first time, we are not waiting on the federal Justice Department, which told the city of New York that we could not proceed because the Justice Department was pursuing their prosecution. And years went by and a lot of pain accrued. And in the meantime, what I'm making working on is making sure, and I have for five years, there will never be another tragedy, there will never be another Eric Garner because we are changing fundamentally how we police.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: But there's one less point I have to say about the Justice Department. The vice president for two and a half of those years, Mr. Vice President, tell us what did you do to try and spur on the Justice Department to act in the Garner case?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: We did a lot. Number one, we made sure we reduced the federal prison population by 38,000 people, number one. Number two, we in fact insisted that we change the rules that police engage in. They had to have--we provided for body cameras, we made sure that there were a lot of things that were changed in the process. But 38,000 people in the federal system were released under the system.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: And so the fact is that there's a lot we've done. But here's the deal, the fact is that we are talking about things that occurred a long, long time ago. And now all of a sudden you know, I find it fascinating everybody is talking about how terrible I am on these issues. Barack Obama knew exactly who I was. He had--he had 10 lawyers do a background check on everything about me on civil rights and civil liberties and he chose me and he said it was the best decision he made.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I'll take his judgment.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: May I please--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: I speak for just about everyone watching when I say I would trust anyone on this stage much more than I would trust our current president on matters of criminal justice.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: We cannot tear each other down. We have to focus on beating Donald Trump in 2020. I want to share a story that a prison guard, a corrections officer in New Hampshire said to me. He said we should pay people to stay out of jail because we spend so much when they were behind bars. Right now we think we are saving money--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: We just end up spending the money in much more dark and punitive ways. We should put money directly into people's hands, certainly when they come out of prison, but before they go to prison.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: That is simply false. And let's be very clear about this. When Vice President Biden was in the United States Senate working with segregationists to oppose busing, which was the vehicle by which we would integrate America's public schools--had I been in the United States Senate at that time, I would've been completely on the other side of the aisle. And let's be clear about this. Had those segregationists their way, I would not be a member of the United States Senate. Cory Booker would not be a member of the United States Senate. And Barack Obama would not have been in the position to nominate him to the title he now holds.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: And so, on that issue, we could not be more apart, which is that the vice president has still failed to acknowledge that it was wrong to take the position that he took at that time. Now, I would like to also talk about this conversation about Eric Garner because I, too, met with his mother. And one of the things that we've got to be clear about is that this president of the United States, Donald Trump, while he has been in office has quietly been allowing the United--United States Department of Justice to shut down consent decrees, to stop pattern and practice investigations. On that case, we also know that the--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --civil Rights Division--this is important. The Civil Rights Division of the United States Department of Justice said charges should've been filed, but this United States Department of Justice usurped. And I believe it is because that president did not want those charges to go forward and they overrode a decision by the Civil Rights Division of the United States--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --Department of Justice. Under my administration, the Civil--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --rights Division will rein and there will be--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --independent investigations.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: When Senator Harris was the attorney general for eight years in the State of California, there were two of the most segregated school districts in the country, in Los Angeles and in San Francisco. And she did not--in fact, I didn't see a single solitary time she brought a case against them to desegregate them. Secondly, she also was in a situation where she had a police department when she was there that, in fact, was abusing people's rights and the fact was that she, in fact, was told by her own people that her own staff that she should do something about and disclose to defense attorneys like me that you, in fact, have been--the police officer did something that did not give you the information would explicate your--your--your client. She didn't do that. She never did it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: And so, what happened? Along came a federal judge and said, enough, enough, and he freed--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --1,000 of these people. If you doubt me, Google 1,000 prisoners freed, Kamala Harris.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: That is--is simply not true. And as attorney general of California where I ran the second largest Department of Justice in the United States, second only to the United States Department of Justice, I am proud of the work we did, work that has received national recognition for what has been the important work of reforming a criminal justice system. And cleaning up the consequences of the bills that you passed when you were in the United States Senate for decades.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: It was the work of creating the fir--one of the first in the nation initiatives around reentering former offenders and getting them jobs and counseling.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: I did the work as attorney general of putting--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --body cameras on special agents--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --in the state of California--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --And I'm proud of that work.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: I want to bring the conversation back to the broken criminal justice system that is disproportionately negatively impacting black and brown people all across this country today. Now, Senator Harris said she's proud of her record as a prosecutor and that she'll be a prosecutor president, but I'm deeply concerned about this record. There are too many examples to cite, but she put over--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: 1500 people in jail for marijuana violations and she laughed about when she was asked if she ever smoked marijuana.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: She brought evidence--she brought evidence that would have freed an innocent man from death row until the courts forced her to do so. She kept people in prison beyond their sentences to use them as cheap labor for the State of California. And she fought to keep trash bail system in place. That impacts poor people in the worst kind of way.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: As the elected attorney general of California, I did the work of significantly reforming the criminal justice system of a state of 40 million people which became a national model for the work that needs to be done. And I am proud of that work and I am proud of making a decision to not just give fancy speeches or be in a legislative body and give speeches on a floor but actually doing the work of being in the position to use the power that I have to reform a system that is badly in need of reform.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: That is why we created initiatives that were about re-entering former offenders and getting them counseling.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: It is why I know that criminal justice system is so broken that I am an advocate for what we need to do.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: To not only decriminalize but legalize marijuana in the United States.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: The bottom line is, Senator Harris, when you were in a position to make a decision and an impact in these people's lives you did not and worse yet, in the case of those who are on death row, innocent people you actually blocked evidence from being revealed that would have freed them until you were forced to do so.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: There is no excuse for that. And the people who suffered under your reign as prosecutor you owe them an apology.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: My entire career I have been opposed, personally opposed to the death penalty and that has never changed. And I dare anybody who is in a position to make that decision to face the people I have faced to say, I will not seek the death penalty. That is my background. That is my work. I am proud of it. I think you can judge people by when they are under fire and it's not about some fancy opinion on a stage. But when they are in a position to actually make the decision, what do they do? When I was in the position on having to decide whether or not to seek a death penalty on cases I prosecuted I made a very difficult decision that was not popular--to not seek the death penalty. History shows that and I am proud of those decisions.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: I spent seven years running a nonprofit that helped create thousands of jobs including hundreds right here in Detroit as well as Baltimore, Cleveland, New Orleans and I saw that the racial disparities are much, much worse than I had ever imagined. They are even worse still. A study just came out that projected the average American--African-American median net worth will be (INAUDIBLE). So you have to ask yourself how is that possible?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: It is possible because we are in the midst of the greatest economic transformation in our history. Artificial intelligence is coming. It's going to displace hundreds of thousands of call-center workers, truck drivers, the most common job in 29 states, including this one. And you know who suffers most in a natural disaster. It's people of color, people who have lower levels of capital and education and resources.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: So what are we going to do about it? We should just go back to the writings of Martin Luther King who in 1967 his book chaos in our communities said we need a guaranteed minimum income in the United States of America. That is the most effective way for us to address racial any quality in a genuine way and give every American a chance in the 21st century economy.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: First of all, the president is a racist, and that was just one more example of it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: We know that whether it is Baltimore or cities like Detroit they have--they are tremendously rich in history and culture and also in possibility. Here is what I would do if I am president. Number one I would invest in tremendous educational opportunity, invest in universal pre-K for three and four-year-olds, invest in improving K-12 education and also making higher education available to everyone through tuition-free public state universities, community colleges, and job training certification programs.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: I would follow up on the work that I did at HUD. We passed the most sweeping rule to further desegregate our communities in the United States. This Trump administration set that back. I would put that back in order.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: I would also invest in housing that is affordable because folks know that the rent is going through the roof.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: And we need to make sure that you don't have to get out of West Baltimore or inner-city Detroit or the west side of San Antonio or anywhere if you want to reach your American dream. I want you to be able to accomplish it in your great neighborhood where you are.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: There is no middle ground about my client. The fact of the matter is I called for the immediate action to be taken. First of all, one of things that we--we are responsible for 15 percent of all the pollution in the country. He's right about how it affects people and it affects neighborhoods, particularly poor neighborhoods. But here's the deal, in that area, there's also another piece. 85 percent of it is something I helped to negotiate, and that is the Paris climate accord. I would immediately rejoined that Paris Accord, I would make sure that we up the ante, which it calls for, I would be able to bring those leaders together who I know, I'd--I'd convene them in the White House like we did the nuclear summit, and I would raise the standard.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I'd also invest $400 billion--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --In research for a new alternative to deal with climate change--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --And that's better than--bigger than any other person.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: The important number in Vice President Biden's remarks just now is that the United States is only 15 percent of global emissions. We like to act as if we are 100 percent, but the truth is even if we were to curb our emissions dramatically, the earth is still going to get warmer. And we can see it around us this summer. The last four years have been the four warmest years in recorded history. This is going to be a tough truth, but we are too late. We are 10 years too late. We need to do everything we can to start moving the climate in the right direction, but we also need to start moving our people to higher ground. And the best way to do that is to put economic resources into your hands so you can protect yourself and your families.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Yes.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --No, I didn't say that--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: My plan calls for 500,000 charging stations around the country so by 2030, we are all electric vehicles. My plan calls for being--making sure that we have $400 billion invested in technologies and learn how to contain what we're doing, creating 10 million new jobs. We will double offshore wind, we will end any subsidies for coal or any other fossil fuel, but we have to also engage the world while we're doing it. We have to walk and chew gum at the same time.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: No it would--we would--we would work it out. We would make sure it's eliminated and no more subsidies for either one of those, either--any fossil fuel.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: That's what I--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: That's what I--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: I mean, I--I have to agree with Governor Inslee and I'm going to just paraphrase one of your great sayings, Governor, which is we currently have a president in the White House who obviously does not understand the science. He's been pushing science fiction instead of science fact. The guy thinks that wind turbines cause cancer, but when in fact it causes jobs, and the reality is that I would take any Democrat on this stage over the current president of the United States who is rolling it back to our collective peril.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: We must have and adopt a green new deal.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: On day one as president, I would reenter us in the Paris agreement--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --And put it in place so we would be carbon neutral by 2030.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: Well, first of all, this is personal. You can imagine. I grew up in Hawaii, which is the most remote island chain in the world. So, for us, growing up there, protecting our environment was not a political issue. It's a way of life. It's part of our culture. It's part of who we are.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: This is why, as a member of Congress, long before there was ever a Green New Deal, I introduced the most ambitious climate change legislation ever in Congress called the OFA, Fossil Fuels Act. That actually laid out an actionable plan to take us from where we are today to transition off of fossil fuels and invest in green renewable energy. Invest in workforce training. Invest in the kinds of infrastructure that we need to deal with the problems and the challenges that climate is--is posing to us today.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: I--I just want to take, first of all, a step back and say that I agree wholeheartedly with Governor Inslee. It's one of the reasons why green peace ranks me and him at the top of this entire field of--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --the candidates on climate--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --I'm just--hey. Hey.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: I want to say very clearly--thank you, man. Thank you.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: I'll try harder. Look, the reason why is because, first of all, this problem didn't start yesterday. Science didn't become a reality yesterday. This has been going on for years. There was another president that would not join an international accord. Then, it was the Kyoto Accord. I was mayor then and I stood up national leadership, joining with other mayors to say, climate change is not a separate issue. It must be the issue and the lens with we view every issue. Nobody should get applause for rejoining the Paris Climate Accords. That is kindergarten.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: We have to go to far advance and make sure that everything from our trade deals, everything from the billions of dollars we spent to foreign aid, everything must be sublimated to the challenge and the crisis that is existential, which is dealing with the climate threat. And yes, the majority of this problem was outside the United States. But, the only way we're going to deal with this--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --is if the United States leads.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: We have a huge problem and it's decades old in New York, but here's what we've done about it. We've declared the eradication of all lead, literally ending the notion of lead poisoning once and for all as the goal of our administration and we're doing something about it. Lead poisoning has gone down 90 percent since 2005 and we're going to literally bring it down to zero because we're going to go into every place, buildings, schools, public housing, and take out that lead, remediate that lead once and for all. And that needs to be done all over this country.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: Now, the federal government used to not take any responsibility for our public housing. For decades, they've been disinvesting in the public housing that was supposed to be a federal responsibility. That's part of why we have this lead crisis to begin with. But, I'll tell you what you do when you're actually in charge of something. I'm in charge of the largest city in this nation. You do not accept the status quo. You fix it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: And so, we are going into every one of those apartments to make sure those children and those families are safe. And then we are going to eradicate that lead once and for all. And there should be a federal mandate to do the same for Flint, for Detroit, for every place in this country.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: --it can be done.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Because people don't wonder what I would do. I have actually done it. I was secretary of housing in urban development when Flint had its water crisis. We did what it could to help folks get water filters and then we didn't stop there. We improved the standard of how we deal with elevated lead levels in children. A lot of Americans don't know that this is still a major problem out there. I was back in Flint about six weeks ago and I released a plan to invest $50 billion so that we remove lead as a major public health threat. We need to do it. We can do it and I will do it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Because we did it. I was asked to manage a $87 billion plan that we spent in total of 18 months that revised this state and many others because it kept us out of a depression. With 2/10 of 1 percent waste to (INAUDIBLE). Secondly, I was part of the--of the organization within our administration that pushed bailing General Motors out saving 10s of thousands of jobs here in this state.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Number three, number three--I also was asked as the Mayor of Detroit can tell you--by the President of the United States to help Detroit get out of bankruptcy and get back on its feet. I spent better part of two years out here working to make sure that it did exactly that. We invested significantly in this city and transportation and 20--anyway. The point is--we made significant investments in this state. I expect in this city--I expect that's why the mayor endorsed me.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: Well, I'm building a coalition of disaffected Trump voters, independents, libertarians and conservatives as well as democrats and progressives. I believe I'm the best candidate suited to beat Donald Trump. And as for how to win in Michigan and Ohio and Pennsylvania the problem is that so many people feel like the economy has left them behind. What we have to do is we have to say look, there's record high GDP in stock market prices. You know what also had record highs? Suicides, drug overdoses, depression, anxiety. It has gotten so bad that American life expectancy has declined for the last three years. And I like to talk about my wife who is at home with our two boys right now. One of whom is autistic.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: What does her work count at in today's economy? Zero and we know that's the opposite of the truth. We know that her work is among the most challenging and vital. The way we win this election is we redefine economic progress to include all the things that matter to the people in Michigan and all of us like our own health, our wellbeing, our mental health, our clean air and clean water--how our kids are doing. If we change our measurements for the 21st Century economy to revolve around our own well being--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: --then we will win this election.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: Donald Trump won this election because far too many people in this country felt like they have been left behind by both political parties--by self-serving politicians on both sides who are more interested in partisan politics than they are in actually fighting for the people.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: I'm speaking the truth to people all across this country about the fact that people in Flint, Michigan are still being left behind--still being poisoned by the water in their system because every single month we are spending four billion-

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: --on a continuing war in Afghanistan, $4 billion every single month rather than ending that were, bringing our troops home, and using those precious resources into serving the needs of the people here in this country. People, communities--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: --like (INAUDIBLE). That is a kind of leadership that I will bring.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: I--I'm grateful--I am grateful. Jake, look, this is one of those times where we are not staring at the truth and calling it out, and this is a case for the Democratic Party the truth will set us free. We lost the state of Michigan because everybody from Republicans to Russians were targeting the suppression of African-American voters.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: We need to say that. If the African Americans vote in the state had been like it was four years earlier, we would have won the state of Michigan. We need to have a campaign that is ready for what's coming, and all-out assault especially on the most valuable voter group in our--in fact, the highest performing voting group in our coalition which is black women. And so I would be a person--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: --that tries to fight against voter suppression that could activate and engage the kind of voters and coalitions that are going to win states like Michigan and Pennsylvania and Wisconsin.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: First of all, Donald Trump came in making a whole lot of promises to working people that he did not keep. He said he was going to help farmers; he said he was going to help auto workers. Farmers are now looking at bankruptcy, soybeans rotting in bills. Autoworkers, we expect perhaps hundreds of thousands will be out of jobs by the end of the year. Jerome Powell just dropped the interest rates, and he admitted why because of the so-called trade policy that this president has that has been nothing more than the Trump trade tax that has resulted in American families spending as much as $1.4 billion more a month on everything from shampoo to washing machines. He betrayed the American people. He betrayed of American families, and he will lose this election--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --because folks are clear that he has done nothing except try to beat people down and instead of live people up and that is what we want in the next president of the United States.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Well, first of all, there are a lot of Americans right now that are hurting. Just go and ask the folks that just received notice that they're going to get laid off by General Motors or ask the many folks who are sleeping on the streets in big cities and small towns across the United States or ask fast food workers that I joined a couple of weeks ago that are working for minimum wage and can't provide for their families or pay the rent. So the idea that America is doing just fine is wrong. Not only that, this president always likes to take credit like he did this. We've now had about 105 straight months of positive job growth, the longest streak in American history. Over 80 months of that was due to President Barack Obama. Thank you, Barack Obama.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Thank you, Barack Obama. So you know, I believe that we need to invest in what will ensure that Americans can prosper in the years to come, making sure they had the knowledge and the--and skills to compete in the 21st century economy, ensuring that they can afford the rent where they live and that they have healthcare so that they don't have to worry about going homeless because they can't afford a medical procedure.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: By pushing for fair trade, not trade deals that give away the sovereignty of the American people and our country, that giveaway American jobs, and that threaten our environment. These are the three main issues with that massive trade deal, the transpacific partnership. I think the central one was the fact that it gave away our sovereignty to a panel of international corporations whose rulings would supersede any domestic law that we would pass, either a federal law or a state or a local law. This is extremely dangerous and goes against the very values that we have as a country, not (SP) to speak of the fact that it would have a negative impact on domestic jobs and that it lacked clear protections for our environment. These are the things that we have to keep at the forefront as we look to enact fair trade deals with other countries to make sure that we continue to be a thriving part of our global economy.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: I would not because the approach that President Trump has taken has been extremely volatile without any clear strategic plan, and it has a ravaging and devastating effect on our domestic manufacturers, on our farmers who are already struggling, and now failing to see the light of day because of the plan that Trump has taken.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I'd renegotiate it. We make up 25 percent of the world's economy. In order--either China is going to write the rules of the road for the 21st century on trade or we are. We have to join with the 40 percent of the world that we had with us, and this time make sure that there's no one sitting at that table doing the deal unless environmentalists are there and labor is there and to make sure we equip our workers first to compete by investing in them now in the things that make them more competitive. That's what we have to do. Otherwise, they are going to write the rules of the road. We must have the rest of the world joining us to keep them--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --In check from abusing.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I would not rejoin the TTP as it was initially put forward. I would insist that we renegotiate pieces of that with the Pacific nations that we had in South America and North America so that we could bring them together to hold China accountable for the rules of us setting the rules of the road as to how trade could should be conducted. Otherwise, they're going to do exactly what they're doing, fill the vacuum, and run the--and run the table.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: Yeah, and I just want to ask this question of all the candidates, but particularly the Vice President Biden, the--President Trump is trying to sell NAFTA 2.0. He's got a new name for it, it's just as dangerous as the old NAFTA, it's going to take away American jobs like the old NAFTA like it did to Michigan, and we cannot have Democrats be party to a new NAFTA. So Vice President, I believe you're the only person on the stage who voted for the original NAFTA. Are you ready to say here and now that you will oppose a new NAFTA and that what you will believe in, which a lot of us hope for, is trade treaties that empower organized labor across-

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: --boundaries of the world and give working people power again, not just--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: --national corporations.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Yes.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Yes.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: No. He said would I insist--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --that labor be engaged. The answer is yes.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: I consider that a victory.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Well, I love your affection for me. You spent a lot of time with me.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: You know what?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: We--we believe in redemption, Joe. We believe in redemption in this party.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Well, I tell you what, I hope you're part of it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: I have seen firsthand the inequities in the business world where women are concerned, particularly in startups and entrepreneurship. We have to do more at every step. And if you're a woman entrepreneur, the obstacles start not just at home, but then when we seek a--a mentor or an investor, often they don't look like you and they might not think your i--idea is the right one.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: In order to give women a leg up, what we have to do is we have to think about women in every situation, including the ones who are in exploitative in abusive jobs and relationships around the country. I'm talking about the waitress who's getting harassed by her boss at the diner who might have a business idea, but right now is stuck where she is. What we have to do is we have to give women the economic freedom to be able to improve their own situations and start businesses. And the best way to do this is by putting a dividend of $1,000 a month into their hands.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: It would be a game changer for women around the country because we know that women do more of the unrecognized and uncompensated work in our society. It will not change unless we change it. And I say that's just what we do.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: I think that's support of my proposal, which is this. Since 1963, when we passed the Equal Pay Act, we have been talking about the fact women are not paid equally for equal work. Fast forward to the year of our (INAUDIBLE) 2019 and women are paid 80 cents on the dollar; black women, 61 cents; Native American women, 58 cents; Latinas, 53 cents. I'm done with the conversation. So, yes, I am proposing in order to deal with this, one, I'm going to require corporations to post on their website whether they are paying women equally for equal work. Two, they will be fined for every 1 percent differential between what they are paying men and women. They will be fined 1 percent of their previous year's profits. That'll get everybody's attention.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --time for action.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: That was a long time ago and here's what it was about. It would've given people making today $100,000 a year a tax break for childcare. I did not want that. I wanted the childcare to go to people making less than $100,000 and that's what it was about. As a single father, who, in fact, raised three children for five years by myself, I have some idea what it costs. I support making sure that--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: --every single solitary--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Person needing childcare get an $8000 tax credit now. That would put 700,000 women back to work, increase in GDP by almost 8/10 of 1 percent. It is the right thing to do if we can give tax breaks to corporations for these things, why can't we do it this way?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: No, (INAUDIBLE).

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: No.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: In the very beginning, my deceased wife worked when we had children, my present wife has worked all of the way through raising our children. The fact of the matter is the situation is one that I don't know what has happened. I wrote the violence against women act. Lily Ledbetter I was deeply involved in making sure their the equal pay amendments. I was deeply involved on all of these things.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I came up with the it's on us proposal to see to it that women were treated more decently on college campuses. You came to Syracuse University with me and said it was wonderful. I am passionate about the concern, making sure women are treated equally. I don't know what's happened except that you are now running for president.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: So--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I never believed it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: Well, I just--listen, I mean now talk about running for president and you change your position on the Hyde amendment vice president where you made a decision for years to withhold resources to poor women to have access to reproductive health care and including women who were the victims of rape and incest do you now say that you have a devolved, and you regret that because you have only sent you have been running for President this time said that you in some way would take that back, or you didn't agree with the decision that you made over many, many years and this--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: (INAUDIBLE)

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: --directly impacted so many women in our country, and I personally prosecuted rape cases and child molestation cases. And the experience that those women have, those children have and that they would then be denied the resources--

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: I think is--is unacceptable.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: The fact is that the senator knows that's not my position. Everybody on this stage has been in the Congress, and the Senate or the House has voted for the Hyde amendment at some point. The Hyde amendment in the past was available because there was other access for those kinds of services provided privately. But once I wrote the legislation making sure that every single woman would, in fact, be--have an opportunity to have healthcare paid for by the federal government, everyone, but that could no longer stand. I support a woman's right to choose. I support--it is a constitutional right. I have supported it. I will continue to support it, and I will, in fact, move as president to see to that the Congress legislates that that is the law as well.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: Well, why does it take you so long to change your position on the Hyde amendment? Why did it take so long until you were running for President to change your position on the Hyde amendment?

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Because there was not full federal funding for all reproductive services prior to this point.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: Okay.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: Well, first of all, I want to say very clearly that I will not do foreign policy by tweet as Donald Trump seems to do all of the time.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: A guy that literally tweets out that we are pulling our troops out before his generals even know what about it is creating a dangerous situation for our troops in places like Afghanistan. And so I will bring our troops home, and I will bring them home as quickly as possible. But I will not set during a campaign an artificial deadline. I will make sure we do it; we do it expeditiously, we do it safely to not create a vacuum that is ultimately going to destabilize the Middle East and perhaps create the environment for terrorism and for extremism to threaten our nation.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: This is real in a way that is very difficult to convey in words. I was deployed to Iraq in 2005 during the height of the war where I served in a field medical unit where every single day, I saw the high cost of war. Just this past week, two more of our soldiers were killed in Afghanistan. My cousin is deployed to Afghanistan right now. Nearly 300 of our Hawaii National Guard soldiers are deployed to Afghanistan, 14,000 servicemembers are deployed there. This is not about arbitrary deadlines; this is about leadership. The leadership I will bring to do the right thing, to bring our troops home within the first year in office because they shouldn't have been there this long.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: For too long we have had leaders who have been arbitrating foreign policy from ivory towers in Washington without any idea about the cost and the consequence, the toll that it takes on our servicemembers, on our--on their families. We have to do the right thing. End these wasteful regime change wars and bring our troops home.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: I would move to de-escalate tensions in Iran because they are responding to the fact that we pulled out of this agreement and it wasn't just us and Iran, there were many other world powers that were part of that multilateral agreement. We would have to try and reenter that agreement, renegotiate the timelines because the timelines now don't make as much sense.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Andrew Yang
body: But I have signed a pledge to end the forever wars. Right now, our strength the broad reflects our strength at home. What has happened, really? We have fallen apart at home, so we elected Donald Trump, and now we have this erratic and unpredictable relationship with even our long-standing partners and allies. What we have to do is we have to start investing those resources to solve the problems right here at home. We spend trillions of dollars and lost thousands of American lives in conflicts that had unclear benefits. We have been in a constant state of war for 18 years. This is not what the American people want. I would bring the troops home, I would de-escalate tensions with Iran, and I would start investing our resources in our own communities.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: I did make a bad judgment trusting the president saying he was only doing this to get inspectors and getting the U.N. to agree to put inspectors in. From the moment Shock and Awe started from that moment I was opposed to the effort and I was outspoken as much as anyone at all in the congress and administration.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Joe Biden
body: Secondly, I was asked by the president in the first meeting we had on Iraq he turned and said Joe, get our combat troops out in front of the entire National Security chain. One of the proudest moments of my life was to stand there and offer our (INAUDIBLE) and tell everyone that we're coming--all our combat troops are coming home. I oppose the surge in Afghanistan. This is long overdue. We should not in fact, gone in Afghanistan.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: We were all lied to. This is the betrayal. This is the betrayal to the American people. To me, to my fellow service members. We were all lied to. Told that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction is working with al-Qaeda and that this posed a threat to the American people. I enlisted after 9/11 to protect our country. To go after those who attacked us on that fateful day. Who took the lives of thousands of Americans? The--the problem is that this current president is continuing to betray us. We are supposed to be going after al-Qaeda. But over years now not only have we not gone after al-Qaeda, who is stronger today than they were in 9/11.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Tulsi Gabbard
body: Our President is supporting al-Qaeda.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: You didn't talk about Iran. We are going to march to war in Iran right now and we blew by it.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Bill de Blasio
body: But we have to stop this (INAUDIBLE) to war in Iran.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Kamala Harris
body: I would never direct the Department of Justice to do whatever it believes it should do. Listen, we all watched the his testimony. I read the report. There are 10 clear incidents of obstruction of justice by this president and he needs to be held accountable. I've seen people go to prison--go to prison for far less. And the reality of it is that we have a person in the White House right now who has been shielded by a memo in the United States Department of Justice who says the sitting president cannot be indicted. I believe the American people are right there should be consequence and accountability for everyone and no one is above the law including the president of the United States.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: My response is exactly that. I've read the report. I've read the redacted versions of there report. We have something that is astonishing going on in the United States of America. We have a president that is not acting like a leader of the free world. He is acting like an authoritarian against the actual constitution that he swore an oath to uphold. And so, this is a difference with a lot of us on this debate stage.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: I believe that we in the United States congress should start impeachment proceedings immediately.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Cory Booker
body: And I tell you this, Debbie Stabana(PH) has now joined my call for starting impeachment proceedings because he is now stonewalling congress. Not allowing to subjecting themselves to the checks and balances. He swore an oath to uphold the constitution. The politics of this be damned. When we look back in history at what happened when the president of the United States started acting more like an authoritarian leader than the leader of the free world the question is is what will we have done? And I believe that congress should do its job.

title: CNN HOLDS DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATES DEBATE
name: Julian Castro
body: Well, I agree. I was the first of the candidates to call on congress to begin impeachment proceedings. There are 10 different instances that Robert Mueller has pointed out where this president either obstructed justice or attempted to obstruct justice.
